title: Login Error: Unable to connect to the Authentification Service
body:
I log in and keep getting this message. 
Servers are up
game is fine
password is correct, etc

But as soon as I hit enter, I get the message "Unable to connect to the authentification service" every time. 
whats going on? 
Is it just me?
 Currently running the repair tool just in case. but this is really frustrating.

replies.body: We actually had a strange issue where those error messages were incorrect, and sometimes that message actually meant the password was wrong. I want to double check that your password wasn't reset for any reason first, so make sure you shoot our account recovery agents a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you can.
